TopicTitle: Wanting to add Koperincus and KSPI to my next lvl

Articles.Content:
So as I am getting to the full career mode of my RemoteTech install. Looking to get out past Eeloo and was thinking this mod combo is my only hope.

So is there a Kopernicus addOn that adds separate start systems as opposed to simply rearranging the Kerbol system. I realize that with Remote tech ion the mix I am looking at new and exiting problems for probe launches but I have a tentative plan that mimics the Ansible idea from enders game. (I am a little worried about my own modding skills but I have hopes)

I know that in days past their were separate star systems, but I have not seen one in the kopernicus family of add ons.

Thanx for the help

Alacrity

Try Galactic Neighborhood, by Sigma88. It adds a few stars, and even detects if you have other planet packs installed, and moves them to their own stars.

There is a list of supported planet packs on the forum page: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/128856-WIP-1-0-4-Galactic-Neighborhood-Integration-of-multiple-planet-packs-in-the-same-game

Thanx Happy, I am looking at the galaxy now and it may be exactly what I am looking for. Now I just gotta talk to the remote tech guys about how I would include a FTL transmitter into their frame work... gods how I hate 3d modeling.

Alacrity
